From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

OOC: Alten Gould,
        Yo dude, me and you may share the same dictionary, Hell is a place,
but YOUR dictionary doesn't matter.  See, I'm against you saying Hell in
this RPG too.  NOT because it's sometimes considered swearing, only because
it is not proper transformer language.  Any Transformers/BW/BM fan knows
that "Heaven" and "Hell" are not the proper terms for the transformers'
heaven and hell

Our Version:  Heaven
Transformer Version:  The Matrix

Our Version:  Hell
Transformer Version:  The Pit

    So there ya go.  Sorry for any email boxes this clogs up and/or for
anybody's time getting wasted.
